FILE: cm290713v11.0.txt
DYAD: POLAND - TAIWAN
RIVALRY: RIV771
DISPUTE(S): MID1448 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180211
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180211

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID1448

TERRMID: MID1448 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID1448 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID1448 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID1448 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID1448 from Gibler (2018), Taiwan seized Polish ships who were carrying goods to China as part of Taiwan's dispute against China. Taiwan was attempting to harm China economically by disrupting its trade. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the China-Taiwan dispute, which was territorial in nature. 

MARITMID: MID1448 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID1448 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID1448 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID1448 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID1448 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1448 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID1448 coded civil war MID because this is connected to the China-Taiwan dispute, which has a civil war element, and Taiwan is within this dyad. 

CIVWARLINK: MID1448 1 -- civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1448 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID1448 coded civil war link because this is connected to the China-Taiwan dispute, which has a civil war element, and China is outside this dyad. 

COUPMID: MID1448 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1448 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1448 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1448 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 
RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
